name: sinan-chrome-extension
description: Tooling dependencies for Sinan Chrome extension.

scripts.sync:vendors: mkdir -p src/content/vendor && cp node_modules/turndown/dist/turndown.js src/content/vendor/turndown.js && cp node_modules/turndown-plugin-gfm/dist/turndown-plugin-gfm.js src/content/vendor/turndown-plugin-gfm.js
